reviews.title: Thats the Piece of Metal.. Awesome
reviews.review_text: OMG, what can i say about the quality of the product. 2K display which is Crisp and neat (match to my iMac 4.5K) all metal casing. Flawless performance with all the regular work and MS office suites. This is what i was looking for a long. and I am so so happy about the laptop itself. This is a piece of metal who is looking for compact sleek stylish.. i am not wrong choosing CHUWI. i will look for more laptops of 2K display that is upcoming form Chuwi.. I had a bad impression about Celeron. never thought Celeron tied with 8 gb ram and 256 gb SSD will outperform this WELL!!!! Color reproduction is outstanding. And windows 11 upgraded as well Thanks, Chuwi for these items with the great price and specs!!

reviews.title: It's working so far.
reviews.review_text: I've been using it without any stress so far. The picture quality is beautiful, it's not that light (although I wasn't looking for lightness), and overall I'm satisfied. I have one complaint: the power cable and the terminal for connecting the main unit are thin and weak. I'm worried that a little force might break it and make it unusable.

reviews.title: The quality is better than I expected (¬∞‚ñΩ¬∞)
reviews.review_text: I found this when I was looking for a lighter computer, because my current one is a bit too heavy to carry around, even though it's more than I need! It's much lighter than I expected and fits easily in my backpack (*^o^*). I was planning to use it as a sub computer, but the battery is sufficient and the picture quality is even better than I expected (^-^). I can also use it as a computer for videos. I think it's hard to find this price even if you go to an electronics store, so it's a bargain (^o^)

reviews.title: Great machine, but not a gaming laptop
reviews.review_text: Great little machine. It's effectively a Macbook Air at less than 1/3 the price and running Windows. It will upgrade to Windows 11 after going through all of the Windows 10 updates. This IS NOT a gaming machine. Look elsewhere for a gaming laptop. For the Linux crowd, this will run Linux beautifully right out of the box.

I love it! I think its definantly a good choice for a cheap laptop! CONS: I have noticed when I go to Youtube sometimes I have to reload the page because if the page stays open to long the video won't play through the speakers! PROS: Thin yet durable! Not to big and not to small! The charger also isnt bulky which I love! Makes a perfect travel laptop!

reviews.title: You get what you pay for
reviews.review_text: I haven't ran into many problems yet but the top buttons don't work at all. I don't mind too much cause I can still do that by myself so it's wtv. Also the speakers are really bad so I don't recommend using things with sound if you don't have headphones. I mean 278 for a 15.6 inch computer 16gb ram and 500gbs it's really cheap I shouldn't have expected it to be super good. But the top row being broken really does suck.

reviews.title: Windows Fresh Install - Drivers a Nightmare
reviews.review_text: First thing I did was a fresh install of Windows 11, highly recommended if you want to ensure no bloatware or hidden software. The problem is that once I installed the Windows ISO, all drivers were missing, including the touch pad. I had to use the Tab, Space bar, and Enter keys to navigate through Windows. Windows update did not reinstall the drivers. I had to use a different computer to download a zip file with the Chuwi drivers, and then proceed to use the Tab, Space bar, and Enter keys to reinstall all drivers. I have not had to use this process of installing drivers since Windows XP. Once all drivers were installed, the laptop works great. It is very responsive and a great value for the price paid. Battery life could be better, but it lasts as expected.

reviews.title: idk about games
reviews.review_text: This Laptop is good for like maybe just files and office work I guess since it can't handle games the best but it can. Game would usually end up with fps of 40 to maybe 50. Other than the problem about the games I guess it's fine for someone that just does office work.

No this is not a gaming laptop as stated. My grandson had several meltdowns because he had done a lot to earn the laptop. My pocketbook took a big hit to get it even to even be able to download games. I had to buy an external storage. It only has one USB port so you have to buy a 3.0 for more ports. Mouse for it my daughter going to have to spend another $70 for a mouse we hope will work. I sent the seller 2 messages and no reply. Think this one had been returned because it shows a girl's name on the sign on screen. I'm really disappointed because I didn't have the extra money to spend. Buyer be ware. The only thing I can say is it came sooner than expected.

reviews.title: Not my first choice
reviews.review_text: Computer works fine, but terrible for gaming

reviews.title: It's a good Chinese PC.
reviews.review_text: This is my second Chinese PC, and I think this one is a hit. I bought one with 8GB memory and 256GB SSD as described in past comments. The Windows version was Home, not Pro. I wonder if this is a common change in Chinese products due to manufacturer's convenience. There is no problem at all for me personally about the US keyboard. I have no problem at all with the US keyboard, and the appearance is good, not cheap like MacbookPro.

reviews.title: Great laptop for price point!
reviews.review_text: This laptop serves as the perfect stop gap for productivity. It‚Äôs light, good battery(roughly 4-6 hrs based on activity) , and runs all basic productivity programs very snappy. Office suite runs like a dream, even heavy PowerPoint load quickly. Never buffering on videos or lag time . Even with tons of tabs open on chrome. Elementary OS Linux runs like a dream on this machine. After a week of use I upgraded the hard drive and that made an even bigger difference. I plan on buying another one for my wife.

reviews.title: amazing laptop but...
reviews.review_text: Amazing laptop for the price. Super lightweight and powerful. However, I have 2 complaints. One is that the battery life is shorter than most other laptops being only around 5 hours-ish if you do everything to conserve your power. Two is windows is not activated on this laptop so you will have to buy a windows key to get rid of the pop-up and to be able to customize your laptop.

reviews.title: It really shouldn't be called a gaming laptop
reviews.review_text: This is NOT a gaming laptop. It can't even play 100 minecraft mods, which my old refurbished dell laptop was able to do and it wasn't even a gaming laptop. I even put my games on the highest graphic settings possible for this laptop, but it still crashed my modded minecraft. I'm giving it 4 stars becaue it does make a good laptop for general stuff like studying and playing normal minecraft. I really wish I just put this $300 away for an actual gaming laptop, do not make the same mistake that I did.

reviews.title: Not reliable
reviews.review_text: I loved the computer, but it can't run one game very well. While I understand that sims 4 is a large game it's the only thing I run.

reviews.title: Nice laptop but battery does not hold up.
reviews.review_text: Really nice laptop, display resolution is so crisp and clear. The only problem was the battery life. 4 hours max and I needed more so I am returning it. Otherwise I would keep.

reviews.title: It's a pretty good deal for a laptop.
reviews.review_text: it's a pretty good deal for a laptop. The only drawbacks are the heat generation and durability of the power supply. If you don't like heat generation, you can choose jumper ezbook x7 or TECLAST F7Plus. If you don't like heat generation, you can choose the jumper ezbook x7 or the TECLAST F7Plus. the keyboard layout is different, so you may have different preferences, but I had no complaints with either of them once I learned. jumper's performance is much lower, but if you use it normally, it's not too stressful to use the internet. It's a little hot on the back of the device, but you don't notice it when using it. The other one is a little hot on the back, but you don't notice it when using it. However, for everyday use, this one is more functional and satisfying, and if you don't play games, You Tube and the Internet are crisp. A friend of mine wanted a cheaper computer, and I had the opportunity to buy two of them, so I could compare them. The price of both was about the same, about 340 US. I almost never use the keyboard in my daily life, and the other person does. Since I don't care about heat generation and durability, but my partner does, I chose this one and he chose the jumper. There is no right answer for Chinese laptops, so you can choose the one that suits your needs. There is no right answer to Chinese laptops.

reviews.title: Amazing! Awesome! Very Nice@!
reviews.review_text: This device is a major surprise. Much more then expected. I am impressed and satisfied. I have the keyboard and pen as a complete system. Someone claimed the pen does not fit the loop on the keyboard. Use the clip on the pen and it fits well. Great screen and with the major Win10 update on the way it will be better yet! Awesome!

reviews.title: Properly usable notebook PC
reviews.review_text: I've bought Chuwi PCs several times before, and I've always found their support to be very good, as long as you complain about any problems, they'll replace it right away. The first one I received did not have a functioning microphone (I checked with my voice recorder), so I had it replaced immediately. The first unit I received did not have a functioning microphone (confirmed by voice recorder), so I had it replaced immediately. It's not light, but not heavy either. It's not light, but it's not heavy either. Battery life is disappointing. However, it is usable. The most annoying problem is that the function keys cannot be used unless they are pressed simultaneously with the Fn key. This is a fatal flaw for Japanese input, and a big problem for work, so I emailed support (Aftersales), and in a few exchanges, they told me where to find the EF file and instructions. I managed to deal with the errors and unclear points in the instructions by myself, and in no time at all, it changed to the normal function key behavior. I really wonder why they don't make this the standard, even though the forum has a lot of complaints about the Fn key. Nevertheless, I'm very happy with the way it turned out.

reviews.title: Good laptop to start gaming on pc for the price
reviews.review_text: Perfect so far was only able to download 3 games before i was out of storage but i figured that buying a GAMING LAPTOP FOR UNDER 300 common sense would tell you to buy more storage or you could always delete the game you're not playing but overall PERFECT

reviews.title: Very Nice!
reviews.review_text: I got this laptop for my 13 year old son. He wants a gaming laptop and from my research, the RAM, Graphics, and Memory are great for a starter device! I turned it on and set it up, I watched some YouTube and surfed like, 15 pages at once while streaming YouTube and it worked great! No lag, no delay, screen and graphics look awesome. I just got gaming keyboards and mice for the laptops (I also got a laptop for my 7 year old son to game on as well but a different brand and a little smaller) and I am going to test that out too. If I can, I will edit this review to include the functionality with external keyboard and mouse.

reviews.title: Bad quality. Bad customer service.
reviews.review_text: After having it for 45 days the charging cable it came with stoped charging the computer. Then a few weeks later the port for the C cable stoped charging. The manufacturer has por customer service. Once they realized it was the motherboard that wasnt working, they stoped responding to me.

Just make sure you have a stand or something because the vent things wear the air blows out is at the bottom üôÇ‚Äç‚ÜïÔ∏èalso if using a wireless mouse make sure it's a c-type mouse that's allü•≤

reviews.title: I was able to upgrade to Windows 11.
reviews.review_text: but the price was cheaper during the time sale, so I bought it. Here are my impressions after using it for about two weeks. There were no initial problems at all, and after several Windows updates, I finally got the notification to install Windows 11.I was going to wait and see how it went, but since I wasn't using it for work, etc., and since I had made recovery media, I half-heartedly upgraded. I used the ac adapter to get the power supply and set the power settings so that the screen would not disappear or the computer would not go to sleep, and then I started. The download didn't take too long, but the installation seemed to take a while. (Sorry! I fell asleep for a bit, so I don't know the exact time.) When I woke up about three hours later, it was done. After booting, it works without any problems.There are a few updates to Windows 11, so I recommend you do them first. I have no problems with drivers or devices, but this is just my environment, so please be responsible for yourself.

reviews.title: Shouldn't be called a 'gaming' laptop
reviews.review_text: Bought this laptop for my son specifically for gaming. Unfortunately, the processing speed isn't good enough to even play Minecraft. He complained of it being glitchy and running slow. I am returning it and getting something with a higher processing speed. I thought this was a really good deal because of the price, but I guess you get what you pay for.

Smaller then i thought ( but that's a me problem). Runs games pretty well( on lower graphics) can do most of what i brought it for. All and all a good basic gamers laptop.

i like everything about it. theres one small thing i dont like and and its the battery life. when its unplugged it only lasts about 2 hours even though its supposed to last about 12 hours. i keep it plugged in about 90% of the time

reviews.title: Small, light, and powerful computer/tablet
reviews.review_text: Great, easily manageable tablet. Nice bright screen. Keyboard grabs (almost magnetically) on or off the tablet. Windows 10 is extremely versatile and compatible with my other computer. Very much like a much more expensive computer/tablet.

reviews.title: Best value for my money!
reviews.review_text: I bought this a year ago and it holds up amazedly well. Excellent battery life and value for the money. Very fast and smooth with the Windows 10 OS. With 256 gb storage and 8 gb of ram and a price of $365 combined detach keyboard and stylist pen.

reviews.title: Untrustworthy Company %26 Product
reviews.review_text: Please do not ever buy products from them. I bought a laptop from them in February of 2024. In October, I started having issues with the cooling fan making terrible sounds. I didn't get to reaching out to them until earlier this month because of things going on in life, but I still did it within the one year after sales period. They told me it would take several months for them to ‚Äúrepair‚Äù it and even then, it is ‚Äúunknown‚Äù. I told them I cannot be months without a laptop, and they told me there's essentially nothing they can do. They then turned around and offered a replacement. I asked them if I would have to cover shipping costs to send the faulty product back, and explained that I cannot afford to send a laptop to New York (do y'all know how much that would cost? I can't do it, I'm struggling to get by right now). They got rude with me, saying that they won't cover the costs because I'm past my one year after sales period, even though I'm not? Then proceeded to tell me I agreed to a partial refund when I was never offered a refund nor did I agree to one, because I wasn't offered one? Even if I had been, I'm not agreeing to a partial refund for something I paid $310 for and haven't even had a year only for it be messing up already.

reviews.title: Best economical laptop
reviews.review_text: This laptop has great features. It has one type C port and one USB 3.0 port. Its sad to see it with only two ports however just buy an additional hub and its fine. You can use the one type C port to charge your other equipment and connect other equipment within the laptop it works great. Just make sure when you run all the programs on the system that you update all the drivers especially network drivers. And its true you do feel an electrical shock wow the laptop is connected to the plug. However its warning you that the PC is consuming a lot of energy. If you plan to have your laptop always connected. My recommendation is to open up the laptop which is pretty easy and disconnect the battery. Theres no point to mess up something that works so great right now. The battery charge lasts about two hours and 45 minutes. Processing speed is what you get for for the amount that you are paying. I do enjoy this laptop recommend it to anyone that is on a budget. BTW works wonders for students !

reviews.title: Cosmetically perfect!
reviews.review_text: It's a cut above the rest of the low-end models.It has 8GB of memory and Win10Pro installed.Win10Pro is installed on it.It has a 256GB SSD, which is perfect.The SSD is also 256GB, which is perfect.It's perfect for normal work.If I were to raise a difficulty, the keyboard layoutIf I had to pick a fault, it would be that the keyboard layout is so special that I kept making typos until I got used to it.Also, the distance between the charging terminal and USB-C is too close.I'm not sure if it's a problem or not. I wish they were separated by 5 mm. The battery life was only a few hours.The battery life is not very good, only a few hours.It is not, but in the range of my usageThe battery life is not very good, only a few hours, but it is acceptable for my usage. If you are looking for a cheap camera, I recommend this one.
